channel.title: Data Analysis on Nick Plunkett
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Nick Plunkett

item.title: Easily create an sFlow collector and dashboard with sFlow-RT
item.description: I’ve recently been looking for an easily deployable sFlow collector to receive and index sFlow data from various network hardware. I came across this post on sflow.com and am sharing it here because it was extremely helpful for me. I was able to get an sFlow collector up within 10 minutes using their Git repository and Docker, and once I got my network hardware configured, I was able to see traffic based on source and destination ASN with implied country based traffic as well. This is super powerful software that is all free and open source, I would highly recommend this if you’re just getting into sFlow data ingestion and querying. https://blog.sflow.com/2023/07/deploy-real-time-network-dashboards.html Internet archive link in case the previous link becomes unavailable: http://web.
